meanings.sent1: The puppy was so sparky, always running around and playing.
meanings.sent2: She had a sparky personality that lit up the room.
meanings.sent3: The sparky little squirrel kept stealing nuts from the bird feeder.
meanings.sent4: Her sparky enthusiasm for the project was contagious.
meanings.sent5: The sparky fireworks lit up the night sky with vibrant colors.

meanings.definition: A small, quick flash of light
meanings.sent1: I saw a sparky in the dark corner of the room.
meanings.sent2: The sparky from the lighter briefly illuminated his face.
meanings.sent3: The sparky from the campfire danced in the night breeze.
meanings.sent4: The sparky of the camera flash captured the moment perfectly.
meanings.sent5: The sparky of the firefly added a magical touch to the garden.

meanings.sent1: She's a real sparky, always ready for an adventure.
meanings.sent2: The sparky of the group, he kept everyone entertained.
meanings.sent3: The sparky dancer twirled across the stage with grace.
meanings.sent4: Her sparky nature made her the life of the party.
meanings.sent5: The sparky leader inspired the team to achieve great things.
